20101214024723.429|20101214024724.857|CCO|       COPD makes it hard
20101214024724.857|20101214024726.286|CCO|       for me to breathe.
20101214024726.286|20101214024727.714|CCO|        But with ADVAIR,
20101214024727.714|20101214024729.143|CCO|      I'm breathing better.
20101214024729.143|20101214024730.571|CCO| So now, I can join the fun and
20101214024730.571|20101214024732.000|CCO|  games with my grandchildren.
20101214024732.000|20101214024733.667|CCO|           Great news!
20101214024733.667|20101214024735.333|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101214024735.333|20101214024737.000|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101214024737.000|20101214024738.667|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101214024738.667|20101214024740.333|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101214024740.333|20101214024742.000|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101214024742.000|20101214024743.429|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101214024743.429|20101214024744.857|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101214024744.857|20101214024746.286|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101214024746.286|20101214024747.714|CCO|       because it contains
20101214024747.714|20101214024749.143|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101214024749.143|20101214024750.571|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101214024750.571|20101214024752.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101214024752.000|20101214024753.111|CCO|        working together
20101214024753.111|20101214024754.222|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101214024754.222|20101214024755.333|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101214024755.333|20101214024756.444|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101214024756.444|20101214024757.556|CCO|        and should not be
20101214024757.556|20101214024758.667|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101214024758.667|20101214024759.778|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101214024759.778|20101214024800.889|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101214024800.889|20101214024802.000|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101214024802.000|20101214024803.250|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101214024803.250|20101214024804.500|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101214024804.500|20101214024805.750|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101214024805.750|20101214024807.000|CCO|        Tell your doctor

20101214024808.250|20101214024809.500|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101214024809.500|20101214024810.750|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
